channel.title: Shops Connection Lost
channel.description:
Hey! I just added a ton of shops to my server and they were all working fine, but now all of a sudden whenever I click on any shop.. I get Connection Lost!
What happened?! I don't wanna have to go back and remove and re-add all my shops again. How can I fix this?
Error I get in: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -86 at client.parseLincomingPakcets<clients.java:17914> at client.packetProcess<client.java:17914> at client.packetSending<client.java:17867> at PlayerHandler.process<PlayerHandler.java:153> at server.main<server.java:49> pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception

item.title: Shops Connection Lost
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

Paste all the code of the shops that give you errors.

Read full topic

item.title: Shops Connection Lost
item.dc:creator: @zeroscape12 zeroscape12
item.description:
@zeroscape12 wrote:

Docent:

Are you giving the shop constructor a negative value? Because an item id or amount cannot be negative.

No, everything LOOKS correct in the files. That’s why I’m so confused! There are only 2 shops in the server that are working, and they are coded no differently than any of the other shops in the server. I’ve replaced the shop npc, i’ve switched out the items and put different ones in… Nothing worked!

Please someone help!! I wanna get back to coding my server but I wanna make sure the shops are working first

Read full topic

item.title: Shops Connection Lost
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

Are you giving the shop constructor a negative value? Because an item id or amount cannot be negative.

Read full topic

item.title: Shops Connection Lost
item.dc:creator: @zeroscape12 zeroscape12
item.description:
@zeroscape12 wrote:

[quote=“KroniKz_, post:4, topic:538805”][quote author=zeroscape12 link=topic=657639.msg4399253#msg4399253 date=1390147620]
I couldn’t find -86 anywhere.
[/quote]
search your whole source -86 lol[/quote]

The -86 number changes depending on the shop I click on… if I click on another shop its -87, or -93 or -95… etc etc… I’m so confused!

Read full topic

item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

Guys it doesn’t necessarily mean that the problem is -86 it could be something to do with the tabbing.

Hey! I just added a ton of shops to my server and they were all working fine, but now all of a sudden whenever I click on any shop… I get Connection Lost!
